entry.title: If you’re an existing member of Developer DAO, and you are able to translate a few sentences from English to Chinese, please send us a DM on Twitter ...
entry.summary: If you’re an existing member of Developer DAO, and you are able to translate a few sentences from English to Chinese, please send us a DM on Twitter with your discord handle. Thank you 🙂

entry.summary: Second initiative launch of the week 👀 Introducing @d_d_agency_web3 - "a collective venture builder focused on investing our time into pushing forward web3 products and services" 👇 D_D Agency: During the last months, we've been working on a new concept to take even further what @developer_dao could offer to the ecosystem. 🚀 𝗗_𝗗 𝗔𝗴𝗲𝗻𝗰𝘆 🚀 If you need services or a partner to design, develop, or lead a new web3 product, reach out! https://agency.developerdao.com

entry.title: 🚨 SCAM ALERT 🚨 We're seeing some fake D_D Twitter accounts pop up with a scam claim link in their bio. They're RT'ing and interacting with commu...
entry.summary: 🚨 SCAM ALERT 🚨 We're seeing some fake D_D Twitter accounts pop up with a scam claim link in their bio. They're RT'ing and interacting with community posts. Please ensure you're only trusting officially channels: @developer_dao http://developerdao.com http://claim.developerdao.com
